item.title: Labour inspector caught red-handed taking Rs 30,000 bribe in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[2 hours ago Minister Khandre launches KSFIC e-commerce website
4 hours ago Accepted report on SC internal reservation with modifications, says CM Siddaramaiah
4 hours ago Tiger found dead in coffee estate in Kodagu
5 hours ago Mahesh Shetty Timarodi and Girish Mattannanavar appear before Belthangady police
5 hours ago Karnataka farmer's ingenious tweak to cow-dung composting bags award
6 hours ago Incessant rains batter Karnataka; flood threat looms, reservoirs near full capacity
6 hours a...]]>
